title: What are some amazing websites that aren't really popular? - Quora

response.answer_text: Movie Recommendation#1. A Good Movie to Watch One of life’s eternal problems is to figure out which among the everlasting & humongous movie list is good and what movie to watch now. This website suggests “highly-rated, but little-known” movies. All the movies and shows suggested here hold a viewer score higher than 70% (7/10 on IMDb for example) and at the same time a critic score higher than 70% (on Rotten Tomatoes, Metacritic, etc). agoodmovietowatch | Good Movies to Watch & Shows Also they hunt down movies and shows that have low voting counts on those same platforms. This website takes care of it with quality suggestions that aren’t exactly well-known. #2. Movie Lens Movie Lens is the ultimate movie rating site for movie-buffs. It lets you find movies rate movies to build a custom taste profile, and then based on your ratings predicts it recommends other movies for you to watch. You can also change the recommendation engines within the site, each will offer a little bit different types of movies. You can import IMDB ratings. MovieLens  Music Recommendation#3. Music Map Search any musician’s or bands name on the homepage and it provides you a suggestion map of other artists you might like. The name of bands (musician) name which are close to what you have searched, the more similar kind the artists pieces will be. They recommends what most people of similar taste likes. The closer two names are, the greater the probability people will like both artists. You can discover some new music. The Tourist Map of Music #3. A Soft Murmur A Soft Murmur is your customizable white-noise machine. Its dashboard, available as an app for both iOS and Android, provides you volume bars which allows you to independently adjust the volume of each of its five sound effects, creating an outdoor ambiance that resembles your favorite soothing activity.  Listening to ambient helps us focus, and We like being able to mix different sounds together to match the environment we are in. You can also save your mixes with different timers and sounds. A Soft Murmur #5. Gnoosic (Gnod) With the tagline Discover New Music Gnoosic learns about you by asking some questions about what you like and what you not and learns about you and parallelly will suggest or ask what you might like. It asks for three of your favourite bands, and based on your interests, spits out an artist that you might like. When Gnoosic was set online its database was completely empty. Now it contains hundreds & thousands of bands and quite some knowledge about who might likes what according to their taste. Gnoosic - Discover new Music #6. Radio Garden This site let's you tune in to any radio in the world you just have to rotate the globe. The whole experience of tuning into stations on Radio Garden was exactly like the analog radio I used to tune several decades ago. Even the crackle and interference of other stations sounded the same. The only difference was that I was using the track pad of my laptop — not the radio dial.And, the best part is its interface. You don’t have to scroll or search. You can just rotate the globe and select the part of the world whose music you want to hear. Radio Garden And yes it is true that the Radio Garden is not connected to any of the satellites launched by ISRO. Refer to answer Is Radio Garden connected to ISRO’s 104 satellites?  Disposable/Encrypted Mail#7. 10 Minute Disposable Mail Id Want a disposable mail Id for you don't want to get spammed by various services you register yourself. Don’t have time to make a new email id everytime? Try disposable email which destroys itself after 10 minutes 10 Minute Mail - Temporary E-Mail #8. Private Note Snapchat in primitive version. Private Note allows you to share information and then it'll get deleted automatically later. Just write whatever you want to or whatever you want to share but just for once, the Private note will encrypt the message and will create an ID. Later just send the link to the readers and they can read the message which will be deleted later. Private Notes #9. Fake Mail Generator Disposable mail addresses are made with the intention of being used and discarded. The names used in these addresses are not personal or real. The Fake Mail Generator is an absolutely free disposable email system. By simply visiting this site the above address has already been activated. Use it instead of your regular email address to avoid spam. When an email is received it will pop up instantly on this page. Fake Mail Generator  Here is some more list of Websites, you may like.#1. What is the weirdest website on the internet? #2. What are some lesser known but useful websites? #3. What is the most interesting website that you found on the internet? Your Thought

Forgotify. Forgotify is a site that generates songs that have never been played before on Spotify. Supposedly there are around 4 million. Surprisingly the songs on Fortify aren’t as bad as you’d expect them to be, as they’ve never been played before. I myself am a fan of rock and alternative rock/new wave music but one song I found on Forgotify is Mystery by Casey Cyr. Mystery is a more mellow song, almost indie and despite not be played on Spotify until about a week ago it’s very enjoyable. Maybe in an alternate universe where I'm into indie music it’s my favourite song. So many people I know enjoy having things that are one of a kind, that are theirs. When people hear no one has done something before or no one owns something they want to do/have that thing. Forgotify gives you something that’s yours, a song you discovered.
